events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and I would like a refund because it doesn't match what I purchased.
The issue described involves an incorrect item received and the customer wants a refund; categorizing under Refund.
Assigning the case to agent Sarah J. who specializes in refund requests and returns.
Hello, this is Sarah from customer support. I understand you received the wrong item, and I am here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify the issue and process your refund quickly?
Here is my order number 548732 and attached you will find the photo showing the item I got, which is different from what I ordered.
Thank you for the information. We have approved your refund request. You will receive the refund to your original payment method within 5 business days.
Thank you for resolving this quickly. I appreciate your help and look forward to the refund being processed.
I have marked your case as resolved since the refund has been approved and will be processed shortly.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund successfully. Please reach out if you need any further assistance.
Closing the case now as the refund process is complete and the customer has been satisfied.
